DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study determine threshold value diaphragmatic excursion ( ultrasound measure : expiration versus inspiration ) best predict 50 % collapsibility inferior vena cava .
DOC.brief_title: Respiratory Variations Diameter Inferior Vena Cava With Spontaneous Ventilation
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary objective study : - determine threshold value diaphragmatic excursion ( ultrasound measure : expiration versus inspiration ) best predict 40 % collapsibility inferior vena cava ( IVC ) . - determine threshold value diaphragmatic excursion ( ultrasound measure : expiration versus inspiration ) best predict 100 % collapsibility IVC . - determine location cut plane TM analysis collapsibility IVC . - evaluate hemodynamic condition normal healthy volunteer . - detect abnormality cardiac function .
DOC.criteria: The volunteer must give his/her inform sign consent The volunteer must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The volunteer participate another study The volunteer exclusion period determine previous study The volunteer judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The volunteer refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform volunteer The patient pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The volunteer know heart disease like heart failure , cardiac arrhythmia The volunteer take cardiotropics The volunteer know lung disease : obstructive restrictive respiratory failure The volunteer clinical sign COPD ( cough morning sputum smoking subject ) Any emergency situation
